sentence.Network_en: Even remarks that were quite innocent could be twisted to produce an unintended effect.

sentence.Network_cn: 政府介入到基本家庭是可怕的,而且很多时候都会产生一些意想不到的后果.

encyclopedia.content: 词典解释 unintended 形容词a. 非计划中的，非故意的歌曲介绍 Unintended出自英国摇滚乐队Muse的第一张专辑《Showbiz》 ，一首动听伤感的音乐，入选十大英伦伤感歌曲。专辑介绍showbiz《Showbiz》 歌手：Muse 地区：英国 语言：英语 专辑类别：欧美音乐1CD 发行公司：Maverick 发行日期：1999年9月 专辑简介： 英国激进摇滚新锐Muse的首张专辑 写介绍好累，摘一段好了-----以下中文摘自gothichead Muse 迎着古典向前 1997年，乐队

entry.def: Unintended results were not planned to happen, although they happened.

example.tran: 人的行为无意中造成的后果

auth_sentence.content: But it has also had a crucial unintended consequence.

Sentence.sentence: Generous parental leave policies and readily available part-time options have unintended consequences:instead of strengthening women's attachment to the workplace,they appear to weaken it.
